a.ts(1,8): error TS6196: 'T' is declared but never used.

==== a.ts (1 errors) ====
    class C<T> { }
           ~~~
!!! error TS6196: 'T' is declared but never used.
    
==== b.ts (1 errors) ====

               ~~~
